author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...JERRY PULLING AWAY FROM NORTHEASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA BUT HEAVY RAINS REMAIN POSSIBLE THROUGH THE OVERNIGHT HOURS FOR NORTHERN LEEWARD AND VIRGIN ISLANDS...
summary: ...JERRY PULLING AWAY FROM NORTHEASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA BUT HEAVY RAINS REMAIN POSSIBLE THROUGH THE OVERNIGHT HOURS FOR NORTHERN LEEWARD AND VIRGIN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM AST Fri Oct 10 the center of Jerry was located near 22.7, -63.9 with movement N at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...JERRY PULLING AWAY FROM NORTHEASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA BUT HEAVY RAINS REMAIN POSSIBLE THROUGH THE OVERNIGHT HOURS FOR NORTHERN LEEWARD AND VIRGIN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM AST Fri Oct 10 the center of Jerry was located near 22.7, -63.9 with movement N at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Jerry (AT5/AL102025)
